import '../styles/App.scss'; import data from '../data/clubs.json'; function App() { console.log(data); const renderClubs = data.map((oneClub, index) => (

  • {`# ${index} `} {oneClub.name}

    Abierto entre semana:{oneClub.openOnWeekdays === true ? 'Sí' : 'No'}

    • )); return (

    Mis Clubs

    ); } export default App;
